channel.title: Cryptography on Blake Niemyjski
channel.description: Recent content in Cryptography on Blake Niemyjski

item.title: What Book Should I get?
item.description: Lately I’ve been wondering what book I should buy. I have narrowed it down to two categories Cryptography, or fractal. Please let me know what you’re thinking. I’ve always been interested in Computer Cryptography and have read a book or two in the past on the subject. However this time around I want something current and fresh. Recently I remembered looking at fractal images in 9th grade, I’ve always wanted to sit down and create one.
